edu.harvard.iq.dvn.core.mail

Interface MailServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MailServiceBean

    public interface MailServiceLocal
extends Serializable
    This is the business interface for Mailer enterprise bean.
